pipeline.title: REST API Pipeline System
pipeline.subtitle: Efficient Management of Interconnected API Call Chains
pipeline.description: A powerful system for organizing sequential HTTP requests to REST API, where each subsequent call can utilize data from the previous one. Provides complete control over request chain execution with progress visualization and intelligent error handling.

features.title: Key System Capabilities
items: Sequential execution of interconnected HTTP request chains
Automatic data transfer between pipeline stages
Detailed real-time execution progress tracking
Intelligent HTTP error handling with retry mechanisms
Conditional request execution logic based on previous results
Automatic cancellation of dependent requests on critical errors
Full type safety at all execution stages

items.name: Pipeline Orchestrator
items.description: central coordinator managing the sequence of API request execution and data transfer between them

items.name: Request Executor
items.description: HTTP request executor with support for retry logic, timeouts, and handling of various status codes

items.name: Progress Tracker
items.description: module for tracking request chain execution progress with detailed breakdown by each stage

items.name: Error Handler
items.description: centralized error handler with classification by types and recovery strategies

items.name: Type Safety Layer
items.description: strict typing layer ensuring data correctness at all pipeline stages

steps.title: Request Chain Configuration
steps.description: Defining the sequence of API calls, dependencies between them, and execution conditions for each stage

steps.title: Initialization and Validation
steps.description: Configuration correctness check, data preparation, and execution progress tracking initialization

steps.title: Sequential Execution
steps.description: Step-by-step execution of HTTP requests with automatic data transfer and intermediate result processing

steps.title: Monitoring and Management
steps.description: Continuous progress tracking, handling emerging errors, and adaptive management of chain execution

steps.title: Final Processing and Cleanup
steps.description: Aggregation of all request results, data finalization, and system resource release

benefits.title: Approach Benefits
items: 40% reduction in development time for complex API interactions
Increased reliability through centralized error handling and retry mechanisms
Improved user experience through accurate progress display
Simplified debugging and monitoring of request chains
Flexibility for implementing complex business processes with dependent API calls
Full type safety reduces runtime errors
Easy integration with existing Vue.js application ecosystem

localization.title: Flexible Localization System with String Overrides
localization.subtitle: Translation Customization Mechanism for Different Bundles
localization.description: The implemented system allows overriding specific strings in locales depending on the project build bundle, providing flexibility in interface customization for different clients.

features.title: Key Features
items: Override specific strings without duplicating entire dictionaries
Support for multiple languages with customization for each
Automatic merging of default and custom locales
Flexible configuration for different build bundles
Preservation of default values for non-overridden strings
Quick addition of new custom translations

items.name: Base Locales
items.description: main translation dictionaries with standard strings for all languages

items.name: Custom Locales
items.description: custom dictionaries with overridden strings for specific bundles

items.name: Merge Engine
items.description: mechanism for merging default and custom locales during build

items.name: Bundle Config
items.description: bundle configuration specifying custom dictionaries for overrides

steps.title: Bundle Identification
steps.description: The system identifies the current build bundle and checks for custom dictionaries for it

steps.title: Locale Loading
steps.description: Base translation dictionaries and custom dictionaries for the specified bundle are loaded

steps.title: Dictionary Merging
steps.description: Default locales are merged with custom ones, with custom strings having priority

steps.title: Result Generation
steps.description: Final translation dictionaries used in the application are formed

benefits.title: Approach Benefits
items: Flexibility in interface customization for different clients
Time savings in maintaining multiple translation versions
Reduced probability of errors when updating locales
Simplified process of adding new custom translations
Maintaining a single codebase for all bundles
Quick deployment of customized versions

seatMap.title: Universal Aircraft Seat Map Display System
seatMap.subtitle: Architecture with Drivers for Different Data Formats
seatMap.description: The implemented system allows displaying aircraft seat maps from various booking systems through a single universal component using special drivers for data transformation.

features.title: Key Features
items: Support for multiple data formats from different systems
Universal seat map display component
Driver system for data transformation
Flexible configuration for new clients
Isolated display business logic
Quick connection of new data sources

items.name: Universal Seat Map Component
items.description: main seat map display component with unified API

items.name: Data Drivers
items.description: specialized drivers for transforming data from different formats

items.name: Seat Map Engine
items.description: engine for processing and preparing data for display

items.name: Configuration Manager
items.description: configuration manager for connecting drivers to the component

steps.title: Data Receiving
steps.description: The system receives seat map data from an external system in a specific format

steps.title: Driver Selection
steps.description: Based on data type or client, the appropriate transformation driver is selected

steps.title: Data Transformation
steps.description: The driver transforms incoming data into a unified format for the component

steps.title: Map Rendering
steps.description: The universal component displays the seat map based on prepared data

benefits.title: Approach Benefits
items: Quick connection of new clients with their own data formats
No code duplication in the display component
Simplified system maintenance and updates
Isolation of business logic from data specifics
Architecture scalability
Reduced development time for new integrations
